==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|alt=渠,𠍲,伊-S. Sixian Hakka:yì}}

===Etymology===
From the initial ''*k''-series of Old Chinese third-person pronouns, cognate with {{och-l|其}}.

In standard Cantonese, the tone has assimilated with the other personal pronouns: {{zh-l|我|tr=ngo<sup>5</sup>}}, {{zh-l|你|tr=nei<sup>5</sup>}}.
